text.autoconfig.online_emotes.title: Online Emotes
text.autoconfig.online_emotes.option.rep: Replacing EmoteCraft messages with more detail
text.autoconfig.online_emotes.option.max: Use this option if your emotes with sound doesn't work, but we don't guarantee it will be fine...
text.autoconfig.online_emotes.option.sel: The server pings each player once every few seconds to avoid losing connection, enable this option if you are still experiencing connection problems
text.autoconfig.online_emotes.option.thr: Number of threads for data processing
online_emotes.warnings.onlyThis: Only streaming via Online Emotes is available!
online_emotes.messages.internal.banned: You have been banned for reason: %s! If this is an error, contact support.
online_emotes.messages.internal.restarti: The server is restarting to update, make sure you have the latest version of the mod!
